website_summaries.verdict: Nice to have a wallet design for the smartphone that's also very thin and easy to carry.
pros: 6 different PU leather colors so you can find just the right style for your needs
Includes multiple slots that you can use to carry cash or credit cards
Easy to maintain a sturdy grip on the material
Doesn't block ports or the camera
cons: Credit card slots are too tight

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, a couple months after buying this the leather started to peel away from the plastic shell and also started to deteriorate so badly that it appears to be melting. What's worse, the deteriorating leather works its way into the spaces between the volume buttons and causes them to stick. The back pockets are also peeling away from the shell...basically it's falling apart and it happened in a very short period of time. I know it's inexpensive and I didn't expect much, but for how rapidly this thing fell apart I would recommend buying something else and don't create the waste.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Fine case, UNUSABLE Pockets
customer_reviews.text: First, the provider was "very slow" to deliver; on the order of 7 weeks slow. Next, the biggest issue is that the pockets are actually too tight to use, so the added utility of the credit card pockets does not exits. If you want a case it is just fine, in fact I like it. But I bought this so I could occasionally go ultra minimalist and only carry my phone. On that front this case fails miserably.
customer_reviews.author: W.E.

customer_reviews.title: Recieved in poor condition
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case but idk what happened to it o r how it passed quality control. It was falling apart when I received it. I was going to send it back but for $12 I didn't even hassle with it. I ended up gluing it together where it was coming it apart and used it for a short time but it didn't last. Otherwise I would have really liked the case if it was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bass

customer_reviews.title: Pleather glued to a plastic casing makes it look great, but the adhesive used is very cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: Took an absurd amount of time for this to get to me, over a month. I’ve had it about a month now and it’s falling apart. Pleather glued to a plastic casing makes it look great, but the adhesive used is very cheap and already coming apart in multiple areas. The threading I coming out of the stitching. The case looks great but I’d never waste my time and money on this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... received the case last week but so far so good. It fits my iPhone 7 really well and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the case last week but so far so good. It fits my iPhone 7 really well and snug. So far, it doesn't look like it will become loose anytime soon but that may change over time. I purchased the gray finish and it looks great. A co-worker of mine has one and it looked so great and I liked it so much that I purchased one the same day. It can be a pain to get a card in or out but not difficult and I am sure that will change once it gets wore in. I have no real cons here and you can't beat it for the price. I will definitely be purchasing other finishes.
customer_reviews.author: Schlick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap means poorly made
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap and I paid the hard way. The case doesn’t bumper around the phone so dropping anything in this car will guarantee a break. Trust me I know and Carpenter isn’t hard... about a week later the ID sleeves started to tear. It’s is completely worthless do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lattie

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case in April 2018, it is now September 2018 and it is falling apart. I realize it was inexpensive, but I expected it to last more than a few months. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: likeprairie

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart in two months
customer_reviews.text: I love the product design however it falls apart in less than three months. I bought two of them just in case the first one was a defect and they both fell apart at about the same time. Do not waste your money unless you only need it for two months.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: I dropped the phone on a corner and it slightly cracked so there was not much protection or impact absorption but it feels nice and is handy with the pockets on the back
customer_reviews.text: Fit my iPhone 7 well and as expected. I dropped the phone on a corner and it slightly cracked so there was not much protection or impact absorption but it feels nice and is handy with the pockets on the back.
customer_reviews.author: mjg86

customer_reviews.title: Stitching started coming out fast; dead by 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It is a good looking case. Unfortunately, it starts falling apart pretty fast. Good thing it is inexpensive. UPDATE: by the end of December, it was done. I almost had my credit card fall out a hole that had worn into the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Heisterman

customer_reviews.title: Attractive IPhone case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s new IPhone 7. He is a minimalis when it comes to wallets and phones. This case fits and gives. Him room for his essential cards. Very attractive..
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thayer

customer_reviews.title: An ok phone cover
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on but slicker finish than I like. If one wanted to put credit cards in slots on back, slots are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It fits my phone well, and has plenty of space for all the buttons on the iPhone 8. My phone is rose gold and I bought the red case. Looks really good! Also, loving the two pockets for drivers license and credit cards. No purse needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: looks pretty but falls apart in few weeks
customer_reviews.text: looks are deceiving, sides are not hammed, glued only and starts falling apart after few times of putting in/taking out of the jeans pocket. starts showing black plastic body, looks ugly, waste of money. I was traveling so missed my return window and now can't use it. I NEED my money back !!
customer_reviews.author: BadiLover

customer_reviews.title: Good phone protection
customer_reviews.text: The built-in pockets are great. However, the pockets are very tight end do not expand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice case with good quality but the only problem is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice case with good quality but the only problem is that you can’t put 2 cards in one slot so only 2 cards fit it the case, don’t plan on getting more in. If you need only 2 cards it’s the case for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ofir Aricha

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch phone case
customer_reviews.text: Picked this little gem up on the $10 deals page! It is a fantastic phone case! Very pretty red leather with 2 slotted pockets in the back! I stick my credit card in there or a $20, grab my phone and go! Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because it looked great in pictures and because it had slots for holding cards. But unfortunately within 5 months of moderate use it has completely disintegrated. Within two months the card slots came apart. Please don't buy this product. It's not with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ananth Akshintala

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality. Only lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: The case looks good and fits well to the phone. However, it is of poor quality and did not last. I bought this in January and started to see massive wear within 3 months. Definite not worth the price. I would have expected for it to hold up for at least 6-10 months for the money I paid. I recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Started out as a great case, fits well, very practical. Put my metro and ID card in it... however, after about 3 months of normal use the stitching and glue started to come un-done. Will probably have to order a different case soon... unfortunately I will not be ordering from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Convenient case
customer_reviews.text: I got this back in April 2018 and love the convenience of putting my license and bit cash in pockets in the back. I can hop in car and run quick errand without my purse. Unfortunately after four month of use the bottom corner of leather is now coming away from case.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Started out great then after 2 months the edges started peeling off
customer_reviews.text: Started out great then after 2 months the edges started peeling off. Contacted seller a week ago and haven’t heard a word. It takes a lot for me me to write a review like this but not hearing back is unacceptable.Good luck, maybe you have better luck than me.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Uggghh What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Ripped the first time we tried to put cards and money! Uggghh What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As much as I love it, its starting to fall apart after 1
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love it, its starting to fall apart after 1.5 months of use (Iphone 7) Stitching is coming undone in one spot and the adhesive they use is tearing. Looks good and convenient tho.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It's good quality and gets the job done being a wallet
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my dad and he loves it. My mom even wants one! It's good quality and gets the job done being a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Leather quickly feel apart and glue came loose
customer_reviews.text: Leather quickly feel apart and glue came loose, looked good for about 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The back of it is great but the sides are junk
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1.5 months and the thing has completely unraveled. Would return it ASAP if I could. The back of it is great but the sides are junk. Would never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Look nice though and I still like it
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. With the pockets on the back, there are 3 layers so my magnetized mount on the dashboard doesn't work as well. Look nice though and I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Firewife

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY CONVENIENT ... I like that!!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer having my phone, ID and major CC in a quick and easy to get to, all-in-one location! Makes life simple, efficient and worry free for the on-the-go ME!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very classy. I have had multiple compliments in the short time I have had it. Cards fit in the back very tightly and that would be my only complaint but that’s probably best so it is still 5 star worthy.

customer_reviews.title: Slim credit card and business card pockets.
customer_reviews.text: I like its function, I just wish it were in a brighter color--I tend to leave my phone behind when it blends in with its surroundings...
customer_reviews.author: darren hatch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the convenience of this case. No problems with it at all.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less then a month and is now falling apart ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less then a month and is now falling apart. Can only fit 2 cards but you will have a hard time getting the second one out.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice! Fits iphone 7 very well! snug fit.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.title: Product is not made for crack resistant’s.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it and find myself using the card holder then ever before. It’s a great style with the leather. However I anticipated a better padding inside the case it’s self to protect the corners more.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: This product looks nice and is slim like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This product looks nice and is slim like I wanted. But the construction is very poor. The leather began to peal off the plastic case within a month.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality stuff, rips in a month of use

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I had higher hopes for this product. I’ve been ...
customer_reviews.text: I had higher hopes for this product. I’ve been using it for less than two months and the leather has started to lift and peel away from the plastic casing. Not impressed with how quickly this item began to wear.

customer_reviews.title: It is not durable at all

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not made well

customer_reviews.title: I only found out when my loved one opened it
customer_reviews.text: Item is listed as a iphone 7 wallet phone case and I received an iphone 6s case. I was a christmas gift that flopped because It was the wrong size and I could not tell it was the wrong size inside the plastic. I only found out when my loved one opened it. Smh I am returning it.

customer_reviews.title: but the case is so beautiful and pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the case for iPhone 7 Plus, but they sent the Iphone 7 normal. I don't know if it's was my fault or what... but the case is so beautiful and pretty good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Case doesn't look similar to the displayed image
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered black and it looks more like grey, the image is pretty deceptive to me. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: sachin

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice/Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Does not look cheap. I wanted to put cards in the back slots, so this worked out perfect. I prefer a case with a gel lip for shock absorption when dropped. But the lip of the case comes over the edge enough that if dropped, it doesn't land on the glass front. I use a glass screen protector, and I have dropped this, and the glass did not break. Nice case. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fox

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to being leather
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty but it doesn't feel like leather, look like leather or smell like leather. My guess is that it's not leather. Too bad I'm desperate for a case or I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: C & K Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I didn't check how long it would take to deliver the case(2-6weeks), I tried to cancel with in five minutes of placing the order, but the seller refused. Outsude of that initial bad experience my father absolutely loves the case. It's durable, fits his iphone8 perfectly like a glove, and feels like a high quality phone case.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Card Slots
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone case. If it wasn’t for the fact that I upgraded my phone I would still have it. It was durable, practical, and the card slots were not too tight but secured my cards.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable...lasted only three months ☹️

I requested a replacement which was denied, however, a 20% discount was offered toward the purchase of another. I believe I’ll look for a similar style case but, better quality.

product_meta.title: V.Empire Leather iPhone Case for iPhone 7 | iPhone 8 Case | Compatible with iPhone SE 2020 | Wallet iPhone Case | Slim Leather Credit Card Holder
product_meta.description:
Color:Brown - 7

Keep your iPhone SE 2020 / iPhone 8 / iPhone 7 protected with stylish convenient with a 2-in-1 smartphone case and travel wallet! 

Are you looking for a smarter, more efficient way to protect your new iPhone SE 2020 protected while keeping your credit and debit cards close—all while eliminating the need for a wallet? If so, the Vintage Empire iPhone SE 2020 / iPhone 8 / iPhone 7 Wallet Phone Case is perfect for you! A true 2-in-1 cover and wallet design, you can keep your phone, money, cards, and ID all in one place for reliable convenience. Great for keeping your phone safe from scratches, drops and accidents, and minimizing the amount of stuff you need to carry, our wallet case is made for those who live life on the go. 

Product Details:

 * Iphone 7 Wallet Phone Case 
 * Premium Cover 
 * Soft Inner Lining 
 * Lightweight, Compact Design 
 * Form-Fitting Peripheral Accessibility 
 * Satisfaction Guaranteed 

Click ‘Add to Cart’ to get a luxury Iphone 7 Wallet Case that offers premium functionality, coverage and durability.
feature_bullets: ✔ Elegant Craftsmanship – (iPhone SE 2020 wallet case | iPhone 7 wallet case | iPhone 8 wallet case) Crafted with premium PU leather, our IPhone 7 wallet case is ultra-slim, trendy, and holds debit and bank cards, a driver’s license, and other essential information.

✔ Superior Edge-to-Edge Protection – This designer IPhone 7 smartphone case and credit card holder boasts a soft inner lining and secures firmly around each edge and corner to provide protection from drops, scratches, dust and accidents.

✔ True Travel Convenience – Great for men and women alike, these leather phone cases fit in your pocket, purse, or backpack and minimize the accessories you need while traveling. Perfect for the minimalist or on-the-go lifestyle!
